ygData.subject: Re: 'Call for Help'
ygData.msgSnippet: well not only do people reading have to find out all the facts, but I believe that person postsing up the message should word it in a way that shows what he
ygData.messageBody:
well not only do people reading have to find out all the facts, but I
believe that person postsing up the message should word it in a way
that shows what he really means and explain since not everyone has
that show. I'm not trying to diss techtv, I never even heard of it,
and when I first read the "call for help" and EQ enthusiest (addict)
it struck me as a sort of blow to the gut. Yes there are people who
do play EQ a lot for many different reasons, one in my case is that
I live in a really borring town and shops close at like 8pm on
weekdays... even the mall... so other than EQ I'd just be sitting
down watching TV... *sighs* I need to move to pheonix or back to
hawaii... anyways just saying that I didn't know about techtv and I
apologize if I said anything harsh, I didn't know what the show was
about or the segment "call for help". but also saying that people
reading should not only know the facts, but also need to be told the
facts for not everyone around the world understands things, like me
being from Hawaii I'm sure most people don't know how to say or what
words mean like "Ikaika" or how to say kalanianiole... but yeah
that's what I think is that facts need to be known that is true, but
also need to be told to those who don't know for ignorance is not
always bliss...

Btw for those on the Rathe. a few guilds are having a Kith raid this
wed, not sure what time atm, but I will find out today and post it up
tomarrow. so all you rogues out there who need the kith raid come
join us for some killing MWAHAHAHAHAHA. peace out all.

Taqard Tactiz 54 Dwarven Rake of the Rathe
"Let's kill them all!! Let no life be left alive!! Then let us DRINK
TO OUR VICTORY!!!"
